name: instant-data-lake-appconnect
label: Instant Data Lake + Auto-Ingestion
short_description: Deploy a free data lake with automated data pipelines. Connect SaaS apps (Salesforce, GMail) to your data lake in minutes.
long_description: This deployable architecture creates a simple, free, serverless data lake with automated ingestion. It provisions three free 'Lite' tier services: 1. Cloud Object Storage (COS): A bucket to store your data. 2. SQL Query: A serverless service to run SQL queries on that data. 3. App Connect: A visual tool to build 'flows' that automatically pull data from other apps (like GMail or Salesforce) and save it to your COS bucket. The SQL Query service is automatically pre-configured to use your new COS bucket.

architecture.description: Deploys one 'lite' Cloud Object Storage instance, one 'lite' SQL Query instance, and one 'lite' App Connect instance. The SQL Query instance is pre-configured to use the COS bucket.

features.title: Deploy in 3 Minutes
features.description: Get a fully functional, serverless data lake with an integration tool running in minutes.

features.title: Zero-Input Deployment
features.description: No configuration needed. Click 'Deploy' and all resources are created with unique names.

features.title: Completely Free
features.description: Uses the 'Lite' plans for all three services, so you can deploy and use it for free.

features.title: Automate Data Ingestion
features.description: Use the visual flow builder in App Connect to pull data from SaaS apps into your lake automatically.

features.title: Instant SQL Queries
features.description: Drag-and-drop or pipe files into your bucket and immediately run SQL on them.
